cluster_classes.class_description: Conceptual and perceptual attributes ascribed to black holes, such as their complexity and aesthetic or conceptual beauty.
cluster_classes.evidence_excerpt: marvel at the awe-inspiring complexity and beauty of these cosmic wonders

members.entity_description: The intricate and multifaceted nature of black holes as cosmic objects.
The perceived aesthetic and conceptual appeal of black holes as cosmic phenomena.

cluster_classes.class_description: Astrophysical entities and their characteristic attributes, focusing on black holes and their defining physical properties and behaviors.
cluster_classes.evidence_excerpt: black holes ... extremely dense astrophysical objects; properties of black holes ... characteristic physical attributes and behaviors

members.entity_description: Extremely dense astrophysical objects whose gravity is strong enough to affect spacetime and emit Hawking radiation.
The characteristic physical attributes and behaviors that define black holes, including their formation-related features and observable effects.

args.new_name: Black Hole Aesthetic and Conceptual Qualities
args.new_description: Subjective, aesthetic, and conceptual qualities attributed to black holes, such as their perceived complexity, beauty, and awe-inspiring nature.
args.justification: This class is focused on subjective and conceptual qualities (complexity, beauty) rather than physical properties, so refining the label/description and aligning the type hint while grouping it under a broader black hole properties Class_Group clarifies its scope and relation to the other class.

args.new_description: Black holes as astrophysical objects and the set of their defining physical properties and behaviors, including formation-related features and observable effects.
args.justification: This class bundles black holes as entities and their physical property sets; refining the label/description and assigning the same Class_Group as the conceptual qualities class connects related but distinct concepts within a coherent black hole properties domain.
